channel.title: DeathMatch and other mods
channel.description:
Hello All,
I have been developing a mod that I would like to integrate some of the content of BM into it (monsters & weapons). It's based off of the HL universe and has several game modes (Coop, FreeForAll, TDM, and DM). You may read more [u][url='https://www.moddb.com/mods/modular-combat']here[/url][/u] However it just seemed like double work when I found BM :smiley: M in the plans. Is this still in the works?
